description: The former museum welcomes worshippers for the first time after being turned back into a mosque.
title: Hagia Sophia: Former Istanbul museum welcomes Muslim worshippers
title_page: Hagia Sophia: Former Istanbul museum welcomes Muslim worshippers - BBC News
maintext: About 1,000 people were allowed in through security checkpoints, while others laid out prayer mats outside. An opening ceremony was followed by a formal prayer service and proceedings were relayed outside on a big screen. Four muezzin recited the call to prayer from each of the four minarets.
